attributes.action: include Ryan Giggs, Manchester United Footballer, in the Queen's Honours List
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ryan Giggs has contributed vastly to British football since turning professional in 1990. He is Manchester United's most decorated player with 19 major honours (English Record!), including 10 Premier League titles and 2 Champions League medals. He has also overtaken Sir Bobby Charlton's long-standing record when he came off the bench in the Champions League Final for his 759 record appearance for the club. A true Manchester United and Footballing Legend. Hail Sir Ryan!!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
